import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { Router } from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: "app-home", templateUrl: "./home.component.html", styleUrls: ["./home.component.css"], }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} navigateTo(path: string): void { this.router.navigate([path]); } }
